caption.center: LARRY W., Appellant v. STATE Of Alaska, DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND SOCIAL
SERVICES, Office of Children's Services, Appellee.

opinion.opinion_text: [Editor's Note: The opinion of the Supreme Court of Alaska, in Larry W. v. State, Dept. of Health and Social Services, published in the advance sheet at this citation, 208 P.3d 156, was withdrawn from the bound volume because it was not intended for reporter publication.Page 163
